Class JdbcReservationRepository

java.lang.Object
com.example.library.repository.JdbcReservationRepository
All Implemented Interfaces:
ReservationRepository
public class JdbcReservationRepository extends Object implements ReservationRepository
JDBC implementation of ReservationRepository.
